trans-unit.source: Specifies the localization attributes for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)] class or class member.
trans-unit.target: 指定的本地化属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)]类或类成员。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be applied to a class, property, or method.
trans-unit.target: 此特性可以应用于类、 属性或方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use localization attributes, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用本地化属性的详细信息，请参阅[本地化属性和注释](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute"></xref> class with a specified localization category.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute"></xref>与指定的本地化类别的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the category setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
trans-unit.target: 获取本地化属性的目标值的类别设置。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示本地化属性的可修改性设置。

trans-unit.source: |Category setting|Meaning| |----------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Resource does not belong to a standard category.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A lengthy piece of descriptive text.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A single line of text, such as a title.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A short text string, such as a control label.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> or other panel that can contain text.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Font-related data such as font family, font style, or font size.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Inherits category from parent node.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource.
trans-unit.target: |类别设置 |这意味着 | |----------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|资源不属于标准的类别。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|一段较长的描述性文本。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|单行文本，如标题。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|短文本字符串，如控件标签。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>或相关控件。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>或相关控件。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>或相关的控制权，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>或相关的控制权，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>或相关的控制权，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton>或相关控件。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>或相关控件。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>或相关控件。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>或另一个面板可以包含文本。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|字体相关数据，例如字体系列、 字体样式或字体大小。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|继承自父节点的类别。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource.</xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory></xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>

trans-unit.source: This does not apply to any child nodes of the resource.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource, or any of its child nodes whose category is set to <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>.|
trans-unit.target: 这不适用于该资源的任何子节点。 | |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|此资源，或任何其类别将设置为及其子节点不本地化<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>。 |</xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory> </xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>

trans-unit.source: The category setting of the localization attribute.
Gets or sets the modifiability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置本地化属性的目标值的可修改性设置。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示本地化属性的可修改性设置。

trans-unit.source: |Modifiability setting|Meaning| |---------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value is modifiable by localizers.| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value is not modifiable by localizers.| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value's modifiability is inherited from its parent node.|
trans-unit.target: |可修改性设置 |这意味着 | |---------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|目标的值是本地化人员可以修改。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|目标的值不是本地化人员可以修改。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|从其父节点继承目标的值的可修改性。 |</xref:System.Windows.Modifiability> </xref:System.Windows.Modifiability> </xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>

trans-unit.source: The modifiability setting of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 本地化属性可修改性设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the readability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置本地化属性的目标值的可读性设置。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the readability settings of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示本地化属性的可读性设置。

trans-unit.source: |Readability setting|Meaning| |-------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value is readable text.| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value is not readable.| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value's readability is inherited from its parent node.|
trans-unit.target: |可读性设置 |这意味着 | |-------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|目标的值是可读文本。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|目标的值不是可读。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|从其父节点继承目标的值的可读性。 |</xref:System.Windows.Readability> </xref:System.Windows.Readability> </xref:System.Windows.Readability>

trans-unit.source: The readability setting of the localization attribute.
trans-unit.target: 本地化属性的可读性设置。
